commentList.translatedContent: The child was taking the college entrance examination and wanted to eat and rest at the hotel at noon, but found that Hanting has a four-hour room with good facilities, windows, no peculiar smell, and a floor for the college entrance examination. It is very considerate and great!
commentList.content: 孩子高考，想中午在酒店吃飯和休息一下，居然發現漢庭有四小時房，設施好，還有窗户，沒有異味，還有高考樓層，非常貼心，很棒！

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好感謝您在眾多酒店中選擇我們，非常感謝您對我們工作的支持和信任，酒店有免費停車場，距離火車站800米，步行需要10分鐘哦，酒店內還增加了送物機器人，免費自助洗衣房，烘乾機，早餐中西自助品種齊全味道很好，期您下次入住帶家人一起品嚐

commentList.translatedContent: Sanitary and clean, not far from the train station, convenient public transport.
commentList.content: 衞生乾淨，離火車站不遠，公交方便。

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好感謝您對我們的支持與信任，酒店是漢庭2.7版本，裝修新穎，設施齊全，酒店距離朝陽高鐵站非常近，無需乘車即可到達，周邊距離大悦城很近，購物美食都很方便，我們的早餐是中西自助餐，品種很多，有北京的特色小吃，期待您常來入住哦
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for your support and trust in us. The hotel is version 2.7 of Hanting, with novel decoration and complete facilities. The hotel is very close to Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station and can be reached without taking a car. The surrounding area is very close to Joy City. Shopping and gourmet food are very convenient. Our breakfast is a Chinese and Western buffet with many varieties and special Beijing snacks. We look forward to your frequent visits.

commentList.translatedContent: The 6-story parent-child room is relatively sanitary and quiet, and the sound of the air conditioner is very small
commentList.content: 住的6層親子房，比較衞生安靜，空調聲音很小

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello, thank you for your stay and comments. We will make persistent efforts to provide you with high-quality services wholeheartedly. Our small courtyard can park and the surrounding transportation is convenient. It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station, and the walking time is about 20 minutes. , the hotel has set up a free laundry room, a food delivery robot, a free reading area and a tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.

commentList.translatedContent: The environment is quiet, the room is clean, not bad.
commentList.content: 環境安靜，房間乾淨，還不錯。

feedbackList.content: 親愛的客人您好，感謝您的肯定，我們酒店不但可以為您提供優美的環境，乾淨的衞生，還毗鄰萬象滙，朝陽大悦城等多個休閑購物場所，是您閑暇之餘的好去處，酒店離北京朝陽站步行衹需15分鐘左右歐，期待您的再次光臨。
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for your affirmation. Our hotel can not only provide you with a beautiful environment, clean and hygienic, but also adjacent to Vientiane Plaza, Chaoyang Joy City and other leisure and shopping places. It is a good place for you in your spare time. , the hotel is only about 15 minutes' walk from Beijing Chaoyang Station. We look forward to your coming again.

commentList.translatedContent: The room is comfortable and clean, the equipment is very new, the environment is very quiet, it is worth recommending.
commentList.content: 房間舒適整潔，設備很新，環境很安靜，值得推薦。

commentList.translatedContent: Clean and tidy, service attitude is very good, cost-effective, there is a robot to order takeaway, you don't have to take it yourself
commentList.content: 衞生乾淨整潔，服務態度很好，性價比很高，有機器人點外賣不用自己去拿

commentList.translatedContent: Good service, rich breakfast, clean and hygienic, convenient to travel.
commentList.content: 服務好，早餐豐富，乾淨衞生，出行方便。

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好感謝您在眾多酒店中選擇我們，非常感謝您對我們工作的支持和信任，酒店距離大悦城打車10分鐘到達，購物和品嚐美食都是非常方便哦。酒店周圍也是交通便捷，周邊餐館、超市應有盡有的，可以滿足您的一切需求，酒店內還增加了送物機器人、免費自助洗衣房，烘乾機，早餐中西自助品種齊全味道很好，期您下次入住帶家人一起品嚐呦
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for choosing us among many hotels. Thank you very much for your support and trust in our work. The hotel is 10 minutes by taxi from Joy City. It is very convenient for shopping and tasting food. The transportation around the hotel is also convenient. There are all kinds of restaurants and supermarkets around the hotel, which can meet all your needs. The hotel also adds delivery robots, free self-service laundry rooms, dryers, and a complete variety of Chinese and Western self-service breakfasts. The taste is very good. I look forward to your next visit Take your family to taste it for the first time

commentList.translatedContent: This is the first time I got off at Chaoyang Station in Beijing, and stayed at this Hanting Hotel for the first time. The environment is nice, clean, and the service is very good. It is not far from Chaoyang Station, and there is a Da Yali restaurant next to it.
commentList.content: 第一次在北京朝陽站下車，第一次入住此漢庭酒店，環境不錯，衞生乾淨，服務很好，離朝陽站不遠，旁邊就是大鴨梨餐飲店。
